welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nieuw-Lekkerland, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available for all passengers throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly intercontinental and non-Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European and domestic flights, as well as some intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi access is only available in certain areas of the terminal.
